title: China Lowers Downpayment Ratio for Commercial Property to 30%
description: The People’s Bank of China has lowered the minimum downpayment ratio for commercial property purchases to 30%, the central bank said in a statement Saturday.
content: The People’s Bank of China has lowered the minimum downpayment ratio for commercial property purchases to 30%, the central bank said in a statement Saturday.
